settings.heading: Return policy (USA)
settings.content:
• If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, you may return your Inkkas item(s) for a refund or exchange here.
  • Return shipping is FREE for 7 days after your order has been delivered to you.
  • For any returns between 8 - 30 days from the date of delivery, the return shipping cost will be deducted from your refund. If you elect store credit, any return shipping cost will be waived.
  • To be eligible for return, items must be in new, unworn condition in the original packaging.
  • Exchanges can only be made for items currently in stock. 
  • You will be notified via email once your return has been processed.

settings.heading: request a RETURn or EXCHANGE
settings.content:
• Request your return/exchange here by entering your order number (provided in the email confirmation of your order) and the email address used to make your original purchase.
  • Follow the prompts for a refund or exchange. 
  • Once we receive your eligible item(s) at our warehouse, we will issue your refund, which you should see reflected back to your original payment method within 14 business days. If you selected exchange, your exchanged pair will be shipped to you.

settings.heading: Refund Timeline
settings.content:
Eligible refunds are processed once the returned item(s) is/are received by our warehouse. Please allow 14 business days from the day your return is received at our warehouse for your refund to be processed. 

Your refund will be processed to the same method of payment used to make your original purchase. 

If the method of payment used at the time of purchase has changed, please note that you will be refunded in the form of store credit only.

settings.heading: Extended Year-End Return Policy
settings.content:
• Orders placed between Dec 3rd - 23rd will have free returns through Jan 6th.
  • Orders placed after Dec 23rd will have the normal return policy (7 days for free returns, more details above).

settings.heading: CLEARANCE RETURNS policy
settings.content:
• For items purchased from our clearance section, you will be required to pay for return shipping. 
  • If you choose to exchange a clearance item, we will cover the cost of shipping the new exchanged pair to you.

settings.heading: How long do I have to return my order?
settings.content: Our warehouse needs to receive and process your return within 30 days from the original purchase date to issue a refund back to your original form of payment. Note that return shipping is FREE if you send your return within 7 days of delivery. For returns between 8-30 days, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

settings.heading: I have contacted Inkkas customer service, when will I hear back?
settings.content:
Inkkas support agents are available between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. We are committed to responding to inquiries within 24 to 48 hours during business hours. You can reach us at support@inkkas.com.  Please note that we do not respond to inquiries during weekends and/or holidays.

For urgent matters or if you haven't received a response from our customer service team in 48- 72 hours (sometimes replies go to spam), please email us at ops@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: What can I do with old Inkkas I no longer wear?
settings.content: Inkkas is always looking for ways to reduce waste, so we encourage all of our customers that are finished using a pair to donate them. There are quality programs across the country and donation centers that will take used shoes. Our partner organization that does a great job taking used shoes and repurposing them is Soles4Souls (https://soles4souls.org). Please continue to support our mission of sustainable habits by donating your used shoes instead of throwing them in the trash.

settings.heading: My item arrived damaged or defective. How can I return it?
settings.content: Oh no! We apologize for this inconvenience. If the order was purchased on our website within 30 days, please contact us at support@inkkas.com with your order number and details about the damage or defect.

settings.heading: RETURN POLICY (CANADA)
settings.content:
1. All returns/exchanges will be sent to our CA Returns Center located in Ottawa, ON. 
  2. Our return policy is the same as US orders (Free returns within 7 days of receipt).
  3. The return shipping costs for orders returned after the 7-day free shipping window will vary depending on the country region.

settings.heading: Return Policy (INTERNATIONAL)
settings.content: 1. For return/exchange requests on orders outside of the US and Canada, please contact us directly at ops@inkkas.com.
